fields.request: Manual QA: Verify embedded Celery is the default service mode
fields.request_details:
1. Install or upgrade a node that previously installed the celery-<service> and celery-beat-<service> units.
2. Run `journalctl -u <service> -n 40 --no-pager` after the restart completes and confirm service-start.sh logs `Skipping systemd-managed Celery units because embedded workers are enabled. Use --systemd to override.`
3. Run `systemctl list-unit-files | grep celery-<service>` and confirm no Celery units remain enabled when the default embedded mode is active.
4. Execute `ps aux | grep 'celery -A config'` and verify that exactly one worker and one beat process are running under the service account.
5. Optionally rerun `service-start.sh --systemd` and confirm the embedded processes do not start while the log explains systemd-managed units are being used.
